mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, parent_id, ancestors, resource_name, resource_key, resource_type, resource_icon, resource_path, resource_url, resource_level, resource_show, resource_cache, resource_page_name, resource_status, comments, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sysResource.id, sysResource.tenant_id, sysResource.parent_id, sysResource.ancestors, sysResource.resource_name, sysResource.resource_key, sysResource.resource_type, sysResource.resource_icon, sysResource.resource_path, sysResource.resource_url, sysResource.resource_cache, sysResource.resource_show, sysResource.resource_level, sysResource.resource_page_name, sysResource.resource_status FROM sys_user sysUser INNER JOIN sys_user_role userRole ON sysUser.id = userRole.user_id AND userRole.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_role_resource roleResource ON userRole.role_id = roleResource.role_id AND roleResource.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_resource sysResource ON roleResource.resource_id = sysResource.id AND sysResource.del_flag = 0 WHERE sysUser.del_flag = 0 AND sysUser.id = #{userId} and sysResource.resource_type in #{resourceType} ORDER BY resource_level
select from sys_resource where (resource_type = 3 or resource_type = 4 ) and del_flag = 0

select distinct role.id, role.role_key from sys_role_resource roleResource inner join sys_role role on roleResource.role_id = role.id and role.del_flag = 0 where roleResource.resource_id = #{resourceId} and roleResource.del_flag = 0
